readingMnemonic: Getting a taller <kanji>stature</kanji> will also make you seem super <reading>sexy</reading> (せき) on the moon and back home on earth. If you stay on the moon long enough, you'll be the tallest person in the galaxy and who wouldn't find that sexy?! Huh?
meaningMnemonic: If you put <radical>two</radical> <radical>two</radical> pound weights on a <radical>person</radical> on the <radical>moon</radical> they'll increase in <kanji>stature</kanji> when they come back down. Everything is lighter on the moon so the person won't even feel the weights. Then when they come back to earth they'll have grown a whole two inches taller!
